mapper.select: SELECT *, DATE_FORMAT(report_time, '%H:%i') AS 'time' FROM travel_group_user_report WHERE DATE_FORMAT(report_time, '%Y-%m-%d') = '${date}' AND group_user_id = '${groupUserId}' LIMIT 1

SELECT u.user_name, u.email, u.avatar_url, u.telephone, tgu.add_time, tgur.location_lng, tgur.location_lat, DATE_FORMAT(report_time, '%H:%i') AS 'report_time' FROM `user` u LEFT JOIN travel_group_user tgu ON tgu.user_id = u.user_id LEFT JOIN travel_group_user_report tgur ON tgur.group_user_id = tgu.group_user_id and DATE_FORMAT(tgur.report_time, '%Y-%m-%d') = '${date}' WHERE tgu.group_id = '${groupId}' ORDER BY is_leader DESC, tgur.report_time
